attributes.action: Bill Bratton. To be Chief of Metripolitan Police.
attributes.additional_details:
It is blatantly obviose the Police need to be sorted out through out these Iselands.The man has a prooven record at is job in his own country.Mp's in England have stated "he cannot have this job because he is not born here".
What a load of nonesence,we the People pay the tax'es therefor we are entitled to hire the very best Person for the job.I believe Mr Bill Bratton is interested in taking on the position?,then Great.I vote=give the Man a start.
